cz.melkamar.andruian.indexer.controller.ui

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.melkamar.andruian.indexer.controller.ui.AdminController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin")
public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller for all admin-related UI actions.

    • Method Detail

      • addAttributes

        @ModelAttribute
public void addAttributes(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Adds default attributes that are expected to be sent with each request to the admin page. That includes the module name, the data definitions registered in the system and running/finished indexing jobs.

      • admin

        @GetMapping
public java.lang.String admin(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        An endpoint method for showing the admin interface.

      • reindex

        @PostMapping(value="/reindex")
public java.lang.String reindex(@ModelAttribute(value="reindexOptions")
                                                                cz.melkamar.andruian.indexer.controller.ui.AdminController.DataDefFileParam dataDefFileParam,
                                                                org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        An endpoint method for reindexing data definitions from the web GUI. It is equivalent to the REST API method AdminRestController.reindex(String, boolean).
        Parameters:
        dataDefFileParam - The form parameter specifying which data definition to reindex.
        attributes - Spring MVC attributes for the redirect back to the admin page after reindexing has started.

      • addDatadef

        @PostMapping(value="/addDatadef")
public java.lang.String addDatadef(@ModelAttribute(value="datadefParam")
                                                                      cz.melkamar.andruian.indexer.controller.ui.AdminController.DataDefFileParam dataDefFileParam,
                                                                      org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        Add a new data definition file, given its URL.
        Parameters:
        dataDefFileParam - The form parameter specifying the URL of the data definition.
        attributes - Spring MVC attributes for the redirect back to the admin page after reindexing has started.

      • removeDatadef

        @PostMapping(value="/deleteddf")
public java.lang.String removeDatadef(@ModelAttribute(value="datadefParam")
                                                                        cz.melkamar.andruian.indexer.controller.ui.AdminController.DataDefFileParam dataDefFileParam,
                                                                        org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        Removes a data definition from the system. The data associated with this data definition WILL PERSIST. In order to delete the data as well, drop it via the removeDatadef(DataDefFileParam, RedirectAttributes) method.
        Parameters:
        dataDefFileParam - The form parameter specifying the URL of the data definition.
        attributes - Spring MVC attributes for the redirect back to the admin page after reindexing has started.

      • dropData

        @PostMapping(value="/dropdata")
public java.lang.String dropData(@ModelAttribute(value="datadefParam")
                                                                  cz.melkamar.andruian.indexer.controller.ui.AdminController.DataDefFileParam dataDefFileParam,
                                                                  org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes)
        Drop all indexed data associated with the given data definition file.
        Parameters:
        dataDefFileParam - The form parameter specifying the URL of the data definition.
        attributes - Spring MVC attributes for the redirect back to the admin page after reindexing has started.
